version_description:
- 2 NEW Gadgets
- Christmas Theme
- Now supports iOS 9

Doraemon let us use his awesome gadgets to improve the game:
- Enhanced graphics using the Deluxe Light
- Added beautiful summer theme using the All Seasons Badge
- Support for more languages thanks to the Translation Jelly! (Don't try to eat your phone, it won't work!)

Everyone come together for Doraemon's Birthday Special! Doraemon was born on the 3rd of September, 2112, which is... 96 years from now? That doesn't stop us from celebrating in the present!
- New Doraemon character is available. Limited Time only!
- Celebrate with a special birthday theme!
Doraemon Gadget Rush now comes with iMessage support! Make your Doraemon adventures more fun with iMessage!

Doraemon Gadget Rush looks even better than before with the following update:
- Enhanced graphics with Deluxe Light

Doraemon Gadget Rush looks even better than before with the following update:
- Enhanced graphics using the Deluxe Light
